p: Anacyclus pyrethrum (L) is commonly known as African pyrethrum, akarkarha, tigendesste, and igendess. It is a species belonging to the family Asteraceae, which is indigenous to Morocco, Algeria, and Spain [ 4, 5]. This species includes the two varieties Anacyclus pyrethrum var. pyrethrum (L) and Anacyclus pyrethrum var . depressus (Ball) Maire [ 6, 7].
